sources.title: North Pal (1953)
sources.description: Casper, the friendly ghost, makes friends with a baby seal at the North Pole. Mama and Papa Seal are afraid of Casper, but the baby and Casper becomes playmates. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/north-pal-1953/

metadata.Plot: Casper, the friendly ghost, makes friends with a baby seal at the North Pole. Mama and Papa Seal are afraid of Casper, but the baby and Casper becomes playmates. The baby is menaced by a huge bear, but Casper scares the bear out of his skin. Now unafraid, Mama and Papa return and accept Casper.
metadata.Actors: Sid Raymond, Jack Mercer, Alan Shay
